title: Interpretation of a dream about urine by Ibn Sirin and leading scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about urine: It has many connotations for its companions that must be understood well, and given the multiplicity of interpretations related to this topic mentioned by our distinguished scholars, we have collected the most important interpretations of this dream in this article, so let us read them next. Interpretation of a dream about urine: The dreamer seeing urine in a dream is evidence that he obtains his money from sources that are not Absolutely please the Lord (Glory be to Him) and this act is unacceptable and he must reconsider himself in it. If one sees urine in his dream, this is an indication that he owns things that are not his right and is exercising his authority over others with great injustice. In the event that the dreamer sees urine during his sleep If he urinates a lot, it means that he will get a lot of money, which will give him the opportunity to live his life the way he likes. Seeing the dreamer urinating in a dream indicates the shameful actions that he performs and he must repent to his Creator before it is too late. Interpretation of a dream about urine by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets The dreamer who sees urine in a dream is a sign of the difficult times he is going through at that time, which makes him feel very distressed. If one sees urine in his dream, this is evidence of his wrong actions that will cause him to get into many problems. If the dreamer sees a lot of Urine on the floor during his sleep, this indicates that he is wasting his money on many unnecessary things. Seeing the dreamer urinating in a dream symbolizes his position on the problems he faced in the previous days. What is the interpretation of seeing urine in a dream for Imam Al-Sadiq? Imam Al-Sadiq interprets seeing the dreamer urinating On himself in a dream as evidence of the abundant goodness that he will enjoy in the following days of his life as a result of his fear of God Almighty in all his actions. If one sees urine in his dream, this is a sign that he will undertake many actions that will expose him to many dire consequences. If the dreamer sees Urinating during his sleep and he cannot control it, this means that he does not act wisely in the situations he is exposed to in his life and this makes him vulnerable to many problems. Watching the dreamer in a dream urinating on his hand symbolizes that he is spending on his family from an dishonest financial source and he must stop. About this matter so that he does not bear burdens for his sins. What is the interpretation of urine in a dream for a single woman? Interpretation of a dream about urine for a single woman It refers to the fact that she follows her desires and does only what pleases herself, without taking into account the dire consequences that will befall her as a result. If the dreamer sees urine during... In his sleep, this expresses the shameful actions that she is committing and for which she will suffer greatly if she does not change them immediately. If the dreamer sees a lot of urine in his dream, this indicates that she is spending a lot of money in excessive excess and she will suffer a serious financial crisis if she does not stop it. Immediately. Seeing a girl smelling urine in her dream symbolizes revealing many things that she was doing secretly and she will find herself in a very embarrassing situation because of that. What is the interpretation of seeing blood urinating in a dream for a single woman? And the dream of an unmarried woman in a dream because she is urinating blood is evidence of her unhappiness.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about golden gouache for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about gold for a married woman: It has many good meanings and heralds happy events, because gold is an expensive metal with high value, as it expresses happy news or pleasant occasions that spread joy or indicate wealth and treasures, but despite the shiny appearance of gold, it remains a hollow metal. Iron, so it could be a warning against those things that are shiny on the outside but black and harmful inside, so it warns against falling prey or being deceived by false thoughts. Interpretation of a dream of golden gouache for a married woman by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream of gold for a married womanGolden gouache in a dream of a married woman is one of the visions A happy dream that brings happiness and heralds good events and a future full of goodness and blessings. Many interpreters also agree that this dream heralds the marriage of one of her children to a well-off person who will bring him happiness and stability in life. This dream also expresses the return of love and happiness to her married life, After the end of these crises and disputes between her and her husband. If she sells gouache to people, this means that she will start her own project and achieve abundant profits and gains through it. But if she sees that her husband gives her gouache, this indicates his intense love for her and his desperate efforts to protect her and provide her with all the means of comfort no matter what. It was the cost. Whereas if someone gave her matte white gold gouache, this is a sign that she will be subjected to deception and deception by someone close to her. Looking for Ibn Sirinâ€™s interpretations? Enter from Google and see them all Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site.Interpretation of a dream of golden gouache for a married woman by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin says that a woman who sees herself wearing a lot of niqab is a strong sign of a significant improvement in her financial situation and a change in many circumstances in her life and the life of her family. Likewise, the The husband giving his wife gifts is evidence that she will soon become pregnant and give birth to good offspring, because he has been hoping for this to happen for a while. She also expresses that her home will include happy events that spread joy throughout her home after she witnessed difficult crises in the past. But if she finds golden gouache in On her way, this means that she will obtain a prestigious job or an excellent position in her field of work and this will be a reason for multiple disagreements. Learn more than 2,000 interpretations of Ibn Sirin Ali on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site from Google. Interpretation of a dream about gold for a pregnant woman. Interpreters continue to interpret this vision as a sign of The time of birth is approaching and this event will bring back joy and happiness to the entire family and their family life. This dream basically expresses that the dreamer will be blessed with a beautiful girl, with eye-catching features and a personality that will attract everyone to her. Also, the shiny golden gouache indicates that there is a large amount of money on the way for her and her family. This will lead to a huge change in their standard of living. He also promises her good news that she will be reassured by the easy birth process that she will see, and that she will not face these difficulties and pains that she imagines will happen. But if she sees that she is hesitant

title: The 7 most important signs of seeing a visit to the fatherâ€™s grave in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of visiting the fatherâ€™s grave in a dream? Interpretation of seeing the fatherâ€™s grave in a dream: Is the dream bad or good? What are the most important concepts proposed by jurists? Does the meaning of the vision differ according to the gender or social status of the dreamer? These questions are important and most dreamers want a clear answer, therefore the following paragraphs contain detailed clues about this scene. Follow them until the end. You have a dream that confuses you. Wait... Google is an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Visiting the fatherâ€™s grave in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about visiting the fatherâ€™s grave indicates the feelings of sadness and loss that will dominate the dreamer if his father actually dies. If the dreamer sees that he is crying loudly at his fatherâ€™s grave, this is a great disaster. He will find him soon and live in confusion because He cannot overcome this suffering to enjoy and live his life again. Without fear or worry. If the dreamer visits his fatherâ€™s grave in a dream and places many beautiful roses with fragrant colors and scents at the burial place, and the dreamerâ€™s clothes are beautiful and expensive, then this is a great victory and a lot of money for the fortuneteller, as he loves to hear happy news in the coming periods. When the dreamer visits His father's grave and he finds him crying and screaming inside and screaming from the intensity of martyrdom, then this is an urgent and important message for the dreamer to take action, supplicate, supplicate and give zakat for him. He was tortured in his grave because of the bad deeds he had committed in his life. Visiting the fatherâ€™s grave in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that the symbol of going to the cemetery in a dream and visiting it is evidence of the humanitarian deeds that the dreamer continues to do until his good deeds increase and God forgives the sins of his death and they enjoy Paradise and His bliss because of the good deeds Their righteous son. Ibn Sirin narrated that if the dreamer dies and has relatives in prison and sees that he visited the grave of his deceased father in a dream, then the vision means that he takes care of the family prisoners and visits them periodically and comforts them. From pain. If the dreamer visited his deceased father in a dream and wanted to return home, but found the graves as if they were surrounded by iron walls and remained inside the graves until the end of the dream, this indicates the dreamerâ€™s treatment. With the liars and hypocrites, and the jurists, including Ibn Sirin, they said this sign because the dead do not listen, nor do they speak, and unfortunately the people with whom the fortuneteller deals will in reality be like the dead, silent and deviant from the truth and let us not talk about it. Visiting the fatherâ€™s grave in a dream for an unmarried woman if The unmarried woman was going through difficult days, and her psychological state was getting worse day by day. She dreamed that she was visiting her fatherâ€™s grave and feeling a great longing for him. She sat next to the grave and read the Qurâ€™an. a. The psychology you are facing now. If an unmarried woman visits her fatherâ€™s grave and finds a sum of one thousand pounds on it, and when she takes it and returns home she finds a handsome young man waiting for her outside the graves, then there are symbols in dreams if they appear together. Which gives a different meaning than the appearance of each symbol individually, meaning that seeing a thousand pounds with the appearance of a handsome young man in a dream after visiting her fatherâ€™s grave is evidence of a happy marriage for her, and a visit from her father. The grave in a dream and its existence

title: Ibn Sirinâ€™s interpretations of seeing a famous man in a single womanâ€™s dream

preview.html: Seeing a famous man in a single womanâ€™s dream: In the world of dreams, girls see many things, real or strange, and in both cases the girl begins looking for explanations for the vision she sees, such as the girl seeing one of the men she knows in reality. What are the expected interpretations of this dream? We will present it in our article. Seeing a famous man in a dream for an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing a famous man in a single womanâ€™s dream. Most dream interpreters talk about a single woman who sees a famous man in her dream and says that his meanings are different and the connotations referred to depend on his relationship with this person and whether there are feelings that she holds against him. Or not? If a girl finds a man she knows looking at her lovingly in a dream, she may think about communicating with her and planning marriage soon. But if the look is bad and he feels angry seeing her, then he may have committed some sins, so he should think about her mistakes and confront them immediately. If This person is her fiancÃ© and he holds a gold ring in his hand. The girl will marry him in the next few days and live a calm and sweet relationship. If this person was recognized in the dream, but he was turning away from her and trying to ignore her, this means that he is someone who is hurting her in waking life and trying to harm her. Harm her. If he sees someone he knows in a dream and in reality there are disagreements and quarrels between them and there is reconciliation between them in the dream, then it is expected that the enmity and bad events will end and the relationship will return to normal, strong will. Seeing a famous man in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin explains the great expert in The interpretation, Ibn Sirin, is that the familiar face that an unmarried woman sees in her dream could be a sign of marriage in the event that he enters her home or that she carries feelings and love with him when she is awake. He tells us that if this person is one of her friends in reality and enters her home, then the dream is A sign of the depth of friendship between them and his help in many matters that concern her. If a girl sees in her dream someone she knows who is angry and speaks badly to her, it is possible that he will distance himself from his relationship in the next few days and the relationship between them will be broken. If the girl is preoccupied with someone and thinks about him and sees him in her dream , the topic refers to the fantasies of the subconscious mind and what it depicts of her. If a man she knows comes to her dream and talks about her in a good way, then this person will respect her a lot, treat her kindly in reality and know her good manners. The Dream Interpretation section on the Egyptian site from Google contains many interpretations And questions from fans that you can watch. The most important interpretations of seeing a famous man in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a well-known cleric in a single womanâ€™s dreamWith an unmarried woman seeing in her dream a cleric she knows, interpretation experts indicate that there are positive events and happy things that she will encounter soon. Face. Seeing a familiar young man in a single womanâ€™s dream. If the young man that the girl found in her dream is her lover, then the vision is good for her to marry him, especially if he is sitting inside his house.

title: Interpretation of seeing eating rice in a dream according to Ibn Sirinâ€™s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing eating rice in a dream According to Ibn Sirinâ€™s interpretation, rice is one of the plants cultivated in most countries of the world, and it is considered a delicious meal that can be added to all types of foods. All interpretations deteriorate in some way in real life, so in this article today we will learn together about me, the interpretation of seeing eating rice in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin.Interpretation of the dream of seeing cooking and eating rice in a dream Interpretation of Ibn SirinIn general, Ibn Sirin believes that seeing rice in a dream Evidence of plenty of nourishment and abundance of goodness, and that a difficult period of problems and difficulties has passed and been replaced by comfort, goodness and joy. There are many interpretations depending on the nature of the vision, such as: If a person sees in a dream that he is planting rice, this indicates fatigue and effort to achieve his dreams and aspirations. If a person sees a rice plant in a dream, and it is in the rice, thriving and beautiful in appearance, and if it is green, then it is news. Plenty of goodness, satisfaction, and success that the dreamer will obtain. But if the dreamer sees in his dream that he is cooking rice, this is a sign of kindness and the abundance of money that he will obtain without fatigue or trouble. But if he sees in a dream that cooked and ready rice has come to him, this indicates Profit and profit in his professional life and business. But if the dreamer sees himself in a dream separating the rice husk from the rice, this indicates that he seeks to liquidate all his suspicious actions and achieve profit from good deeds with great fatigue and effort. And if the dream in which the dreamer cooks rice with the husk indicates That he will spend the money that he has saved throughout his life and as a guarantee for his future. If you see rice cooked with meat, this indicates joy and pleasure on the dreamerâ€™s path. Interpretation of the dream of seeing cooking and eating spoiled rice in a dream according to Ibn Sirinâ€™s interpretation. If one sees in a dream that the rice crop has dried up or has become dry And it is not edible, then this is a sign of the despair and torment that the dreamer feels as a result of the many difficulties and problems that he faced. If the fortuneteller cooked rice that was spoiled or rotten, or its color is yellow. It is not used in white rice: it is pure white. If the rice is moldy or rotten, and whoever saw it He eats it in his sleep or cooks it, as this indicates his awareness of the problem and its aspects. As for whether the fortuneteller ate rice with milk while wearing pajamas, this indicates the distress of the situation and the fears that have accumulated on him. Interpretation of a dream about seeing eating rice in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is cooking rice, which is The main meal in a large feast is chicken or meat, then this indicates good news on its way to her. And if the dreamer eats pure white rice with a sweet taste in her dream, this is a sign of good news on the way to her, and her heart will rejoice. But if she eats rice with her hands, this indicates She will obtain a lot of sustenance without effort or trouble. Interpretation of the dream of seeing eating rice in a dream for a pregnant woman. For a pregnant woman to see rice in her dream, this is a sign of the abundance of goodness that is coming her way and the good news of an easy and quick delivery, happiness and blessings.

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about many sweets, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about many sweets: Sweets are a type of wonderful taste as they have many shapes and types, and the dreamer sees a lot of sweets in a dream. He will certainly be surprised and pleased, especially if they taste great and he seeks to know the interpretation of the dream, so in this article we examine together the most important things that the commentators said. Regarding this vision. Interpretation of a dream about a lot of sweets. Interpretation scholars say that seeing a lot of sweets in an unmarried girlâ€™s dream indicates upcoming joy and the arrival of good news. If the dreamer sees sweets in a dream and eats them, it tells her that the worries and sorrows that she felt at that time will go away. Also, seeing the dreamer in a dream eating good-tasting sweets indicates an improvement in the financial condition and the achievement of what he wants. As for the person seeing in a dream that he is buying a lot of sweets, this portends an imminent marriage to a fair girl with whom he will have good luck. The fortuneteller, if he dreams of eating sweets With honey, it symbolizes achieving many goals and overcoming difficulties and problems. If the dreamer sees in a dream that she enters a sweets store and buys them, this portends her a new happy life that she will live soon. The lady, if she sees in a dream that she is eating sweets, and she is beautiful, this heralds her wide bliss and almost Satisfaction. Interpretation of a dream about many sweets by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin says that the dreamerâ€™s vision of many sweets in a dream indicates many benefits and goodness that will come to him. The dreamer who sees sweets in a dream and eats them symbolizes the blessing that will come to her life. A single girl sees a lot Of candy in her dream foretells her joy and the good news that will come to her. As for seeing a married woman in a dream eating a lot of sweets, it symbolizes happiness and opens the doors of happiness before her. If the dreamer sees in a dream preparing sweets, it gives her good news about the abundance of the system. food and the many good things that you will gain. title: Interpretation of a dream about cheating on oneâ€™s wife and its consequences

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about wifeâ€™s infidelity in a dream, dreams of marital infidelity are disturbing dreams that make the dreamer think and worry and want to interpret the dream and get its interpretation, as the interpretation of such dreams has many meanings and connotations, they may be positive or negative and depend on their interpretation of some details of the spousesâ€™ life if they dominate Their life differences, jealousy etc. His life and his position in these matters are very painful and difficult. We will learn about the interpretations of the dream of infidelity. Interpretation of the dream of infidelity in a dream: It is considered one of the dreams that happen to a person with a negative character, introducing doubt and destroying family life. Many dream interpreters described the dream of marital infidelity as an annoying and very bad dream. For both genders. It denotes extreme devotion to the other person and everlasting love for the wife, deeply rooted in her heart. It can also be a sign that something in life is falling apart. If you dream that your wife is cheating on you with a rich man, this is a sure sign that you will suffer from poverty and problems And perhaps adultery. If a man dreams that his wife is cheating on him, this indicates a successful marriage. If a woman dreams that someone close to her is cheating on her, this is a sign that she is afraid of him and does not trust him. Interpretation of a dream about a woman cheating on her husbandâ€™s brother. A dream about a girl cheating on her has different meanings for different dream interpreters. Some may find it a fascinating sight, while others may find it annoying. The most clear interpretations are as follows: If a single girl dreams that her partner is cheating on her, this is a sign that she will eventually divorce. The meaning of a husband cheating on his wife in a dream is a promotion at work and a lot of financial gains that benefit the husband. However, if a pregnant woman sees that Her husband is cheating on her in a dream. Her dream indicates that her husband, God willing, will succeed in his career and climb the corporate ladder. When someone sees in a dream that he is lying and deceiving, this vision is a sign that his circumstances have changed for the worse. This happens or they will move on from Rich to poor, or from health to illness. In addition, seeing someone in a dream cheating and crying in a dream means that the dreamer has faced many difficulties and crises, but he will overcome them all with Godâ€™s help. Seeing someone in a dream that his friend is on An affair is a sign that the dreamer will be betrayed and betrayed by a close friend. Seeing someone in a state of betrayal in a dream indicates that something negative happened in this personâ€™s life and that it was difficult to escape. title: What is the interpretation of a gold necklace in a dream for a woman married to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: A golden necklace in a dream for a married woman. Interpreters believe that the dream indicates kindness and brings a lot of news to the dreamer. In the lines of this article, we will talk about the interpretation of seeing a golden necklace for a married woman, and we will mention the signs of a bad purchase and a gift. The golden necklace is on the lips of Ibn Sirin and the leading scholars of interpretation. A gold necklace in a dream for a married woman from Ibn Sirin. A gold necklace in a dream for a married woman. The interpretation of a dream about a gold necklace for a married woman indicates kindness and indicates that many positive things will happen in her life in the coming period. In the event that she sees The dreamerâ€™s husband gives her a gold necklace, then the dream indicates that he loves her, is loyal to her, and prefers her over himself. If the dreamer is facing financial problems in the current period and she sees herself wearing a gold necklace, then the dream indicates that God (the Almighty) will give her a lot of money Soon. It indicates that the married woman feels psychologically stable after a long period of stress and anxiety. The vision symbolizes a pleasant surprise that will knock on her door soon and indicates a happy event that will take place in the coming period. The dream indicates that the dreamer will succeed in her work and earn a lot of money after adversity and fatigue. Necklace Gold in a dream for a woman married to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that the dream is evidence that the dreamer is an honest and sincere person who treats people with kindness and gentleness. The vision also symbolizes that he carries many responsibilities, but he is not late in any of them. It is an indication that the married woman will succeed in her professional life and occupy A high position in the country in the near future, and the dream brings good news that her worries will be removed. If the necklace is broken in the dream, this indicates that the dreamer is exposed to turmoil in her religion and must return to God Almighty and follow the right path. If the dreamer sees her husband wearing a gold necklace, then the dream It symbolizes that he will soon face a big problem and will need her attention and support until this crisis passes. To get the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google, the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site, which includes thousands of interpretations by major interpretive scholars. A gold necklace in a dream for a pregnant woman. The interpretation of a dream about a gold necklace for a pregnant woman explains her safety and that she and her fetus are healthy. Completely, and if she sees herself giving the golden necklace to her child, this indicates positive changes in her life soon. To see herself wearing a long golden necklace indicates longevity, an abundance of blues, and a general improvement in circumstances, and if the necklace was beautiful in the dream and looked new and expensive, this means That she will be completely happy and live the most beautiful days of her life after the birth of her child. If the dreamer is in the first months of pregnancy and does not know the sex of the fetus and sees her husband giving her a gold necklace, then the dream indicates a male birth. If the pregnant woman sees herself wearing a gold necklace cut into The vision indicates that she feels afraid of giving birth, which disturbs her and robs her of happiness.
